Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members
Summary: Relates to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members; provides for a twenty-year retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members.
LawCode: Add ยง604-j, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to modifying the retirement program for Triborough bridge and tunnel members
